title: MBMBaM 454: Face 2 Face: April Foods’ Day
description: We apologize to the city of San Jose for how many pranks we did on this episode, in which we celebrated the Great Pranking Day while recording a live show. If you want to be similarly pranked, good news! This episode also has details on the Become the Monster tour, coming (maybe) to a city near you!
author: shows@mbmbam.com (Justin McElroy)
